sources.full: SW5e: The Halcyon Remnant - A SW5e One-Shot

trait.name: Traits Siege Monster The rancor deals double damage to objects and structures

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The rancor makes three attacks: two with its claws, and one with its bite.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) kinetic damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) kinetic damage.

action.name: Throw Boulder
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 60/240 ft., one target. Hit 21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) kinetic damage.

trait.name: Mandalorian Tech
entries: Weapons deal 2x dice of damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mandalorian makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Techblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 2d6 + 3} (10) kinetic damage.

action.name: Flash Grenade (once per day)
entries: {@dc 14} Con save: {@condition blinded} [fail] (1min; repeat start of turn). The mandalorian throws a grenade at a point it can see within 35ft of it. It explodes, affecting each creature within 10 feet.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The mandalorian moves up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

monster.name: Mandalorian Trooper
languages: Galactic Basic and Mando'a Challenge 2 (450 XP)                    Proficiency Bonus +2

trait.name: Mandalorian Tech
entries: Weapons deal 2x dice of damage.
Special equipment. The mandalorian has an assortment of equipment, consisting of:
1x flash grenades

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mandalorian makes two weapon attacks and throws an electrostun grenade, if available.

action.name: Blaster Rifle
entries: Ranged: (105/420 ft.), To hit +5, {@dice 2d8 + 3} (12) energy.

action.name: Hidden Blade
entries: Melee: (5 ft.) To hit +5, {@dice 2d4 + 3} (8) kinetic.

action.name: Flash Grenade (once per day)
entries: {@dc 14} Con save: {@condition blinded} [fail] (1min; repeat start of turn). The mandalorian throws a grenade at a point it can see within 35ft of it. It explodes, affecting each creature within 10 feet.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The mandalorian moves up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

monster.name: Mandalorian Commando
languages: Galactic Basic and Mando'a Challenge 5 (1,800 Xp)                 Proficiency Bonus +2

trait.name: Mandalorian Mettle
entries: The mandalorian has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened} and {@condition charmed}.

trait.name: Mandalorian Tech
entries: Weapons deal 2x dice of damage.
Special equipment. The mandalorian has an assortment of equipment, consisting of:
3x fragmentation grenades.
Wrist flameer.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mandalorian makes two weapon attacks and uses a special equipment, if available.

action.name: Blaster Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@dice 2d6 + 4}) energy.
Hidden blade. Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@dice 2d4 + 4}) kinetic.

action.name: Frag Grenade (once per day)
entries: {@dc 14} Dex save: {@dice 2d10} (11) [fail] or half [success] kinetic. The mandalorian throws a grenade at a point it can see within 35ft of it. It explodes, affecting each creature within 10 feet.

action.name: Wrist Flamer
entries: Each creature in a 15-foot cone or 5-foot wide line from the mandalorian must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage or half as much on a successful one. The fire spreads around corners and ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The mandalorian moves up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

bonus.name: Jetpack
entries: While active, the Mandalorian has a flying speed of 30 feet. The jetpack lasts for a maximum of 10 minutes.

trait.name: Atmosphere Agnostic
entries: The mynock can survive in any type of atmosphere or vacuum.

trait.name: Battery Drainer
entries: If the mynock attaches itself to a piece of equipment that needs energy to function, that piece will stop working until the Mynock is removed.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The mynock has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one ally of the mynock is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Energy Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) kinetic damage, and the mynock attaches to the target. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the Mynock. If attached to a target, at the start of each of the mynock's turns, the target loses 5 ({@dice 1d4 + 3}) hit points due to energy being drained, and the Mynock gains those hit points.

bonus.name: Detatch
entries: The mynock can detach itself from a target as a bonus action.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The rathtar can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Grasping Arms
entries: The rathtar can have up to eight arms at a time. Each arm can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying an arm deals no damage to the rathtar, which can extrude a replacement arm on its next turn. An arm can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a {@dc 15} Strength check against it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The rathtar makes four flailing arm attacks, uses Reel, and makes one attack with its bite.

action.name: Flailing Arms
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) kinetic damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) if it is Medium or smaller. Until the grapple ends, the rathar can't use this arm on another target. The rathtar has eight arms and can have up to four creatures {@condition grappled} at a time.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) kinetic damage.

action.name: Reel
entries: The rathtar pulls each creature grapples by it up to 15 feet straight toward it.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The rat has advantage on on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing and smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The rat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if it is {@condition grappled} by at least one of the rat's allies.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 2d4 + 2}) kinetic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled}.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The dianoga can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dianoga can make two attacks: one with its tentacles and one with its bite.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) kinetic damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 11}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) kinetic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until the poison ends, the target is {@condition paralyzed}. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the poison on itself on a success.
